description:
Owen had been fucked twice before. He was about to get his ass slammed again, and I asked him what he thought about the activity at this point.
"It's interesting," he said with a smile. "It's an interesting sensation."
I think he thinks it's more than interesting. I think he really likes it.
Owen looks all innocent, but there's a dirty boy lurking under that cute face and hot body!
Cooper is the same way. He smiles and laughs just before he fucks someone silly!
title: Cooper & Owen
